StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: B.Tech. (Computer Science) with nearly 2 years of rich experience as a Data Analyst with exposure in Data Sciences In-depth knowledge of various tools like Python, Pandas, NumPy, SQL Hands-on experience in reporting based projects, Analyzing Sales Figures, Market Research and Logistics Expertise in preparing financial operational reports in form of charts, graphs & tables Working knowledge of financial markets and Pharmaceutical domain Proactively analyzed data to answer key questions from stakeholders or out of self-initiated curiosity with an eye for what drove business performance, investigating and communicating areas for improvement in efficiency and productivity People-friendly, collaborative & approachable with strong planning, interpersonal, analytical and problem solving skills

PositionHistory.Title: Programmer Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Trainee Since May'19: Programmer Analyst Key Result Areas: Performing data acquisition & extraction, data analysis (quantitative and qualitative), data presentation and reporting Presenting client specific actionable information in the form of daily, weekly and monthly reports; preparing executive reports showing the performance of the business unit against the goals
https://freesearch.naukri.com/preview/printResume?uname=aeb 54c140614310f005808160d5a4e5e6&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681574 2/2/20 23&14
Delivering KPI reports to clients and stakeholders using presentations / diagrams; reviewing reports and data to ensure errorless process of merging/de-duplication of customer records Building advanced Excel spreadsheets, using linked tables, pivot tables, conditional formatting, formulas, functions, advanced lookups, so on; creating large PowerPoint presentations with embedded charts and tables
Projects Executed: Title: Quota Setting, Reporting Tool Objective: Client wanted to set sales targets for its marketing field force in US geography. The project is a part of Incentive Compensation Program, wherein sales goals are floated to the sales representatives, based on attainment of target percentage payout for the employees is decided
Role: Managed end-to-end design of automated tool/application using Python Performed data analysis, cleaning, validation and processing to dynamically produced excel based reports Drafted Mock up project templates for project approval and business requirement documents Designed project workflow from initial to end stage
Title: Space, Development & Support Objective: SPACE is a web based reporting tool in which client is provided with an end to end reporting solution. It's a single page application which is developed on HTML 5 (browser compatible). One stop solution from Data load to flexible business rules to Real time processing to online reports. Designed to suit the Sales analytical and Incentive compensation needs of pharmaceutical companies
Role: Developing software solutions by studying information needs, conferring with users, studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes Understanding process requirements and providing use cases for business, functional & technical specifications by interfacing with the clients Planning & discussing the technical processes of the next cycle phase or iterations of the software application that is under development; ensuring quality deliveries and taking accountability for efficiency Preparing SQL Queries for data loading and data validation queries to check data usability, relevance and integrity based on business rules and data priority level Ensuring automated flow of operations by working with SPACE which is a web page which provided clients with an end-to- end reporting solution Loading the data into different schemes like Staging, UAT and Production through mappings Making visualization reports (Matplotlib based) and excel reports after processing data for testing of tableau dashboards and Data Processing Good exposure to reporting projects and developing dashboard using Tableau, SQL and Excel Experienced in working under strict deadlines, while maintaining extreme precision
Notable Highlights: Received multiple client appreciations and acknowledgments Reduced cost by 6%

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 37% of this job

Degree.Comments:
UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Computers) from Northern India Engineering College, GGSIPU in 2017
PG: in 0
